Class Answer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Answer

  • public class Answer
extends java.lang.Object
    An answer in the game of jeopardy.
    Version:
    3.0 2018-05-30
    Author:
    Devdigvijay Singh

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Answer()
      Creates an answer with default characteristics.
      Answer(boolean hasBeenUsed)
      Creates an answer with the specified state of being answered or not.
      Answer(int pointReward)
      Creates an answer with the specified point reward.
      Answer(java.lang.String text, int pointReward)
      Creates an answer with the specified category, text and point reward.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Answer

        public Answer()
        Creates an answer with default characteristics.

      • Answer

        public Answer(boolean hasBeenUsed)
        Creates an answer with the specified state of being answered or not.
        Parameters:
        hasBeenUsed - whether this answer has been used; true if it has been used; otherwise false

      • Answer

        public Answer(int pointReward)
        Creates an answer with the specified point reward.
        Parameters:
        pointReward - the points rewarded for selecting the correct question; must be a non-negative integer

      • Answer

        public Answer(java.lang.String text,
              int pointReward)
        Creates an answer with the specified category, text and point reward.
        Parameters:
        text - a String stating this answer; may not be null
        pointReward - the points rewarded for selecting the correct question to this answer; must be a non-negative integer

        public void setPointReward(int pointReward)
        Sets the point rewards of this answer.
